comment.author: 김성욱
comment.content: 최덕선씨와 통화했는데요, MFX란 회사고요, Don Mills와 Eglinton에 있습니다.

post.content:
Location : Markham
ROLE: Senior J2EE Developer
SERVICE AREA: Open Technology
REPORTING TO: Manager
*Client allows you to work from home on Tuesdays and Thursdays.
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:
· Provide fast and quality production support to customers by closely working with the BAs and customers to analyze and resolve issues through data and/or code fixes. · Design and implement new product feature enhancements and provide recommendations on best approaches. · Work with a team of developers and/or independently as needed to execute tasks within the allotted timeframe and deliver quality solutions. Provide guidance to junior staff as required. · Conduct thorough unit testing and assist the BAs with functional, system and interface testing. · Analyze business requirements and provide accurate technical work estimates. · Perform other duties as required.
TECHNICAL QUALIFICATIONS:
Must Have · Strong communication skills (both verbal and written) · 7-10 years of experience in the design, development and deployment of n-tier enterprise applications using industry standard J2EE, utilizing technologies such as Servlets, MVC, JSP using Struts framework, Hibernate, EJB, and JDBC Must have frontend and backend support experience with J2EE · Familiar with Design Patterns and SDLC process · Proficient in HTML, Javascript, XML and XSLT. · Proficient in SQL Inner join & Outer join · Excellent analytical, debugging and problem solving skills. · Excellent team player with strong interpersonal skills. · Ability to design, develop and test new enhancements using various J2EE technologies. · Experience with WebLogic 6.1 or 8.1 or WebSphere · Frontend and Backend support experience with J2EE
Nice to Have not mandatory · Familiarity with Unix, MQ Series, and LDAP. · Working knowledge of oracle 8i/9i, and PL/SQL · Visual Basic 6, VB.Net, COM, DCOM, ActiveX, Excel and Word VBA, and MS SQL Server. · Insurance
EDUCATION: · University Degree or College Diploma
HANDS ON EXPERIENCE IS A MUST
Debbiera@intps.com
Debbie Rae INTPS Inc (International Placement Services) 905-940-6003
post.title: J2EE 6 month contract - working home two days a week
